name: Survival
description: Those who thrive where others perish. Hunters, scouts, and trackers who endure the wilds through instinct, adaptation, and relentless focus.

features.name: Natural Resilience
features.description: You gain advantage on Survival and Navigation checks in nonmagical terrain.

features.name: Hunter's Reflex
features.description: When rolling Initiative, you may move up to 10 ft immediately before combat begins.

features.name: Keen Eyes
features.description: You can identify creature tracks, terrain signs, or nearby movement with a Wisdom (Perception) check as a Bonus Action.

features.name: Beast Companion
features.description: You may befriend a beast with a DR equal to your character level divided by four (rounded down). Command them as a bonus action; they take their turn immediately after yours in initiative.
